definition: to leak (of water or gas)/to drip/to drain/to discharge/to leak out/to divulge (secrets)/to give vent (to anger, spite etc)/to disperse/to reduce

sentences.english: In early July 2010, the lake finally began flowing over the spillway.
sentences.chinese: 2010年7月初，堰塞湖终于通过泄洪渠开始放水。

sentences.english: After 2002 flood, by inspecting again no damage was found.
sentences.chinese: 2002年泄洪后检查未发现损坏现象。

sentences.english: This paper has analyzed the main problems of a control system for floodgate.
sentences.chinese: 本文对泄洪闸门控制系统的主要技术问题进行分析。

sentences.english: New technique is applied to reconstruct the diversion tunnel to the vortex flow tunnel with energy dissipation.
sentences.chinese: 应用新技术将导流洞改建成旋流消能泄洪洞。

sentences.english: Simulate numerically the cavitation in the flood-discharge tunnel with orifices for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 首次对孔板泄洪洞的空化初生进行了数值模拟。

sentences.english: There's approximately 90 homes that are in the way of the floodway.
sentences.chinese: 大约有90户居民的房子挡住了泄洪道。

sentences.english: This paper provides the experimental results on flood release and energy dissipation for Geheyan Project.
sentences.chinese: 本文着重介绍隔河岩枢纽泄洪消能试验研究成果。

sentences.english: This paper expounds the structural design of flood-discharging and sand-sluicing gate of Shilihe Reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了十里河水库泄洪冲沙闸的结构设计情况。

sentences.english: The disastrous flash floods in Yarkand River were caused by the dewatering of glacier-dammed lakes.
sentences.chinese: 叶尔羌河灾害性突发洪水系由冰川阻塞湖泄洪所致。

sentences.english: Cavitation downstream of the reversion curve of a spillway tunnel is one of the important problems studied in hydraulic engineering.
sentences.chinese: 泄洪洞反弧段下游的空蚀是工程中的一个重要课题。

sentences.english: The floods that followed tested the Three Gorges Dam to near-capacity.
sentences.chinese: 接踵而来的洪水挑战了三峡的泄洪极限。

sentences.english: The spillway cannot be blocked, otherwise it will cause a serious problem.
sentences.chinese: 不能堵塞泄洪道，否则后果不堪设想。

sentences.english: Water pouring over the spillway appears white, likely resulting from its rapid flow.
sentences.chinese: 泄洪渠上的水流呈现出白色，估计是快速流动的关系。

sentences.english: The scene of flood discharge at Danjiangkou dam, central China's Hubei province.
sentences.chinese: 湖北丹江口大坝开闸泄洪的场景。

sentences.english: The dam builders underestimate the risk of spillway failure.
sentences.chinese: 水坝工程师低估了泄洪道失控的风险。

definition: (of a watercourse) to breach its dike/(of dikes) to collapse
(of a watercourse) to breach its banks/(of a dam) to burst
to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
